alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 2:22AM HST until December 15 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FOR LANAI AND PORTIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR ALL REMAINING HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... .A cold front will push south of the Big Island this morning. Strong winds behind the front will be particularly gusty over and downwind of mountains and through valleys. ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 45 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph. * WHERE...Lanai and portions of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
